Odoo GoogleDrive Cloud Storage

Google Drive to Store and Share Your Odoo Data!

Google Drive is worldwide famous and has 1 Billion+ users which is developed by google for file storage and synchronization services.

Google Drive offers you to save your files in the cloud which are accessible from anywhere, anytime. However, it Also offers you complete security along with accessibility. Moreover, it offers 15 GB free storage to the users.

Taking consideration of Odoo; it helps you to manage your business hassle-freely. Hence, you can manage all your business related data in Odoo. Excess data in Odoo can lead to slow down which is important to be fixed.

Isn't it a great idea to store your Odoo data in Google Drive?

Store Data in Google Drive For Fast Processes

Odoo Google Drive Cloud Storage allows you to save your data to Google drive directly from Odoo.

Moreover, if you want to share your data that is saved in Odoo to anyone but cannot give him/her access to your Odoo then why not share the data via Google Drive which is a secured solution for cloud storage.

Now, you must be thinking how to sync your Odoo data to Google Drive?

Here is what Odoo Google Drive Cloud Storage does for you. Odoo Google Drive Cloud Storage allows you to import as well export data in Odoo.

Importing Files From GoogleDrive to Odoo

You can import all types of attachments like media files, reports, excel sheets, etc from specific folders of GoogleDrive.

After mapping folders, you can Import all the Files from the specific folders or from the specific object of the folder at Odoo end.

You can import data to Odoo in bulk as well as you can store all the attachments in a specific object (directory should be mapped properly) at Odoo end.

Exporting Files From Odoo to GoogleDrive

You can export files directly from a specific folder, or directly from an object. Moreover, you can also export files in bulk.

You can create directories at Odoo end using filtered Objects and then you can easily export these directories to GoogleDrive.

Moreover, Odoo GoogleDrive Cloud Storage allows you to export data on the basis of their categories

  • Features
  • Configuration
  • Odoo End
  • GoogleDrive End

Key Features

Below is the detailed list of features for Odoo GoogleDrive Cloud Storage Module

GoogleDrive Cloud Storages for your Odoo Data

  • Now store your Odoo Data in GoogleDrive Cloud Storage
  • Manage Attachment type and its size in the GoogleDrive Cloud Storage

Create Data Directly in The GoogleDrive Cloud Storage

  • You can Create Folders/files in the Cloud
  • The files/folders can be used in Odoo directly

Manually Export File(s) from Odoo to GoogleDrive

  • You can export files to the cloud
  • The files are managed properly in the cloud.

Export files on Scheduled based or Real-time

  • You can manage schedulers to export files to GoogleDrive
  • Or, export files from Odoo in Real-time

Set Limitations to Export Files

  • Exporting files in bulk at a time can cause glitch
  • Hence, set maximum number of files allowed to export at a time

Create Root Folders in Odoo

  • Create Root Folders in Odoo to manage all the folders and files inside it
  • Root Folders helps you to recognize folders saved inside it
  • You can export root folders directly to GoogleDrive

Differentiate folders using Advanced Filters

  • Advanced filters to differentiate same object into different folders in Odoo
  • Like, you can create different folders for abandoned carts, quotations, etc.

Import File(s) from Odoo to cloud

  • You can Import File of a specific folder to Odoo.
  • You can import data to Odoo in bulk as well as you can store all the attachments in a specific object (directory should be mapped properly)

Data Synchronization to the cloud

  • You can dynamically sync data Model wise as well as record wise from Odoo to Cloud
  • You can sync data folder via cron scheduler in Odoo

Update Data to the Cloud

  • You can update file(s) to the cloud from Odoo
  • Or, update the whole folder to Odoo

Access Files From Anywhere

  • You can access files directly from GoogleDrive; no matter where you are. So, no need to login to your Odoo to access files saved in GoogleDrive

Managing Synchronization History

  • All the synchronization history is managed in Odoo

Newly Introduced Dynamic Dashboard

  • You can access files directly from GoogleDrive; no matter where you are. So, no need to login to your Odoo to access files saved in GoogleDrive
  • Introduced a dynamic dashboard to track the data of GoogleDrive in your Odoo.
  • Import/Export the data directly from the dashboard.
  • Well-designed Donut Chart and progress graph to analyze the data.
  • The dashboard also offers Clickable tabs and data cards.

Donut Chart to Analyze the data

  • Analyze the total number of folders and files
  • Check the status of synchronization

Progress Bar to Analyze the Attachment Types

  • It shows the detailed information of the files
  • You can analyze files on the bases of their types

Clickable Data Cards for the Details

  • View the grouped folders and files for easy tracking
  • The tabs are clickable and direct you to the respective data.
